Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and offers unparalleled value in its category. I believe it could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Considering its quality and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you for $1800000. I am confident this investment will pay off in numerous ways. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,800,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,800,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
